cards.title: Sphere
powers: Either choose an Emanation in play and put a card with the same title into play from your trash, or {Sphere} deals 1 target 1 melee damage and 1 energy damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a target. Reduce damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: Time for justice. No autographs, please.
openingLines.VainFacadePlaytest.BlitzCharacter: Who're you calling fake? Without me, you're nothing!
openingLines.VainFacadePlaytest.GrandfatherCharacter: Back to kill me again? It'll be even harder since I destroyed your pet.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Don't worry, citizens, Sphere is here!

cards.title: Alien Heart
body: The first time each turn a non-hero card prevents you from playing a card, you may use a power.
The first time each turn a non-hero card prevents you from drawing a card, you may play a card.
The first time each turn a non-hero card prevents you from using a power, you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Subject 9 shows more promising{BR}results: Forcefield generation with no apparent side-effects, despite the orb{BR}subsuming his heart.

cards.title: Alteration Ward
body: At the start of your turn, select an Emanation. Destroy all Emanations that are not copies of that card.
When {Sphere} would be dealt exactly 1 damage, prevent it. The first time each turn {Sphere} is dealt damage by a non-hero target, draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Hit on Sphere was a failure. Bullets{BR}can't pierce the bubble. Good news is he{BR}thinks BPD shot at him. Doesn't suspect us.'

cards.title: Battle Aura
body: At the start of your turn, select an Emanation. Destroy all Emanations that are not copies of that card.
Increase energy and melee damage dealt by {Sphere} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: I thought you said it was a{BR}forcefield? What kind of forcefield{BR}[b]cuts through walls?[/b]

cards.title: Bowled Over
body: {Sphere} deals 1 target X plus 2 energy damage, where X is the number of Emanations in play.

flavorQuotes.text: Want to play chicken? Be my{BR}guest.

cards.title: Callous Disregard
body: {Sphere} is immune to psychic damage this turn. {Sphere} deals each hero 1 psychic damage. You may destroy an environment card for each point of damage dealt this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Now, dear, if I'm to stop Sphere{BR}from destroying Bastion City, I'll require your skills. I believe you are programmed{BR}for murder?

cards.title: Collateral Damage
body: Destroy all environment cards. {Sphere} deals himself X projectile damage, then another target X times 2 projectile damage, where X is the number of environment cards destroyed in this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Hey, REAPER 3! You imitate, but{BR}you never learn. Want to see real{BR}power? Copy this!

cards.title: Combat Barrier
body: At the start of your turn, select an Emanation. Destroy all Emanations that are not copies of that card.
When {Sphere} is dealt damage, you may discard a card.
When you discard a card for any copy of this card, {Sphere} deals the source of that damage 1 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Sphere can't touch{BR}us. BPD's after him.
Deliver a message for me: I'm on{BR}vacation, I'm not gone. You say my{BR}name, you answer to me.

cards.title: Conventional Explosives
body: {Sphere} deals up to 5 targets 2 fire damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: It's time we gave you some real{BR}firepower.

cards.title: Conversion Field
body: At the start of your turn, select an Emanation. Destroy all Emanations that are not copies of that card. Then select a damage type.
When this card enters play, select a damage type.
When {Sphere} is dealt damage of that type, he regains 2HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Absorbin' electricity{BR}now? Anythin' t'look good for{BR}the cameras, huh?

cards.title: Field Projection Stabilizer
body: When you play an Emanation, you may draw or play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: The first unit was{BR}shipped from-
I hear that you've been asking about{BR}me. Leave X51 in the past. You don't{BR}want me as an enemy.

cards.title: Gen 3 Orb Channeler
powers: Return an Emanation from in play to your hand. If you do, {Sphere} deals 1 target 3 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: To our surprise, the proof-of-concept{BR}worked as-is, but only in 9's hands.{BR}It's as if the ship reacts only to him.

cards.title: Orb Projection
body: At the start of your turn, select an Emanation. Destroy all Emanations that are not copies of that card.
powers: {Sphere} deals 1 target 1 energy damage or increase energy damage dealt by {Sphere} by 1 until the start of your next turn. You may use a power.

flavorQuotes.text: What good is it if he{BR}can't fight at a range?
He can fire the forcefield out from{BR}himself briefly. Short range, but effective.

cards.title: Rebounding Forcefield
body: At the start of your turn, select an Emanation. Destroy all Emanations that are not copies of that card.
When {Sphere} would be dealt damage, if that damage is less than or equal to X, you may discard a card to redirect that damage to the non-hero target with the lowest HP.
X on this card = twice the number of copies of this card in play.

flavorQuotes.text: Could you thugs get it together{BR}already? This is frankly embarrassing.

cards.title: Shield Barrier
body: At the start of your turn, select an Emanation. Destroy all Emanations that are not copies of that card.
Reduce damage dealt to {Sphere} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Don't trust him, but don't{BR}underestimate him, either. I've seen him get hit by a freight train. Barely scratched him.

cards.title: Test Subject 9
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 Emanations are revealed. Put one into play and one into your hand. Discard the other revealed cards.

flavorQuotes.text: We did what we had to do. We can't{BR}be held responsible for personnel failures. We made soldiers with the best tech we had.

cards.title: X51 Quantum Field Stabilizer
powers: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until an Emanation is revealed. Put it into your hand or into play. Discard the other revealed cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Stand down, soldier! You{BR}are not authorized-
Shoot me, then. That ship is calling{BR}to me. I want to hear what it has to say.
